name: Quinoa & Veggie “Fried Rice” Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: quinoa, vegetable oil, garlic, ginger, mushroom, broccoli floret, medium carrot, pea, egg, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, scallion
recipeIngredient: 1 cup uncooked quinoa (roughly 3 cups cooked quinoa)
recipeInstructionSteps: In a medium pot, cook quinoa according to package instructions in 2 cups of water. Once cooked, fluff with a fork, then set aside.
In a large pan, heat oil, then sauté garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add mushrooms, broccoli, and carrots. Stir until vegetables are tender.
Return cooked quinoa to the pan. Add peas and stir until well-mixed.
Create a space in the middle of the pan, add the eggs and scramble. Once the egg is cooked, stir it in with the rest of the dish.
Add the soy sauce and give the dish a final stir. Serve while hot. Garnish with sliced scallions (optional).
Serve while hot. Garnish with sliced scallions (optional).
